notesStmt.note: Imperfect: type at right edge failed to print.

"That this is a true copie compared with the original sent in His Majesties letter and is prin[ted and] published by order of the General Court sitting in Boston in New-England the second of October, [1678] Edward Rawson s[ecr.]"
Text begins: "I, A.B. do truly and sincerely acknowledge ..."
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
